t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.
Detect and report suspected IP infringement with our powerful tools. Accurate submissions drive our feedback loops to block violations automatically—before they impact your brand or customers.

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: Sponsored ads on Amazon help build your brand and drive sales. Invest in long-term business growth by advertising your brand and products on Amazon.

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads
s: March 21, 2025 - Amazon DSP introduces Brand+ and Performance+: AI-powered tools that simplify campaign management and optimize for your goals.

t: Customer Behavior Analytics to Grow Your Brand
s: Get the data you need to assess customer satisfaction, build customer loyalty, and earn more repeat business. Improve customer engagement and drive repeat purchases The Repeat Purchase Behavior dashboard provides a detailed breakdown of how often customers repeatedly buy from your brand.

t: Amazon Brand Analytics: Get data to grow your business
s: November 2, 2022 - Amazon Brand Analytics is available to brands enrolled in Amazon Brand Registry. Brand Analytics helps businesses better understand their customers and brand performance through aggregated customer search and purchase data.

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: Online Shopping site in India: Shop Online for Mobiles, Books, Watches, Shoes and More - Amazon.in
s: Amazon.in: Online Shopping India - Buy mobiles, laptops, cameras, books, watches, apparel, shoes and e-Gift Cards. Free Shipping & Cash on Delivery Available.

t: Amazon brings Amazon Clinic, One Medical under a single brand
s: Amazon One Medical now offers customers two ways to get convenient, high-quality health care: Pay-per-visit telehealth for 30+ common conditions (like pink eye, the flu, or a sinus infection), or Membership where customers pay a monthly or annual fee for on-demand virtual care, easy booking ...

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand
s: Amazon IP Accelerator connects you with a network of vetted legal service providers that offer trademark support and other intellectual-property services.

t: Amazon.es: online shopping for consumer electronics, books, sports, household items, fashion and more.
s: Discover and buy online: consumer electronics, fashion, household items, books, sports and more at low prices on Amazon.es. Free delivery with Amazon Prime.

t: In A Survey, Amazon Stands Out As Minnesota's Most Trusted Retail Brand
s: Amazon tops a recent survey as America's most trusted retail brand, with 11 facilities enhancing service in Minnesota's evolving retail scene.
